heading: Hi, I’m Alfred - Business Graduate & Web Developer in Progress
body: I’m a BSBA graduate expanding my skill set into front-end web development. My business foundation gives me a unique perspective on user needs, teamwork, and problem-solving, while my technical learning in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and UI/UX design helps me create clean and effective digital experiences. I’m passionate about combining design, technology, and strategy to build meaningful web solutions.
